name: Arrowz
description:
This game was made for the Kingsbuild Jam No.1 at https://itch.io/jam/kingsbuild-jam-no-1. Overall, I spent about 4 hours on it, as I had only joined the jam with a day left.

 | * | Instructions | * |

Shoot arrows into the target by pressing space. The target will then begin rotating. Shoot as many arrows as you can, but don't hit your previously shot arrows.
